blogs.title: Testing the useState hook
blogs.body: The useState is a function to make a reactive value, and also provide us with a way to change that value whenever we want.

blogs.title: How to use it
blogs.body: First we need to call it and supply it with initial values. We want to store it in an array destructuring which contain two value, the initial state and the set state (we can name the state whatever we want).

blogs.title: Test Result
blogs.body: If all the paragraphs show up, then the useState works properly.
